name: Z U B E R I O N
name_original: Z U B E R I O N
description:
Precision. Reflex. Timing.

Zuberion is a fast-paced, single-player, avoidance game where your main goal is to collect Zuberion energy pods to save ally planes. As the last pilot of the Zuberion Elite force you are the only hope. 

Features:
 
- Minimalistic design
- Captivating game-play
- Immersive soundtrack
- Unlock ally planes
- Leaderboard tracking
